8.question: I am spending a day in Medellín and staying at The Charlee Hotel. I will leave my hotel at 9:00 AM and plan to visit three key attractions: the Plaza Botero (2 hours), Lleras Park (1.5 hours), and the Museum of Antioquia (1 hours). Schedule my day if I plan to visit these place in this order: First Lleras Park, then Plaza Botero, then Museum of Antioquia and finally come back to hotel. I will use public transport.
8.context:
The Charlee Hotel is located at Cl. 9A #37-16 in the El Poblado area of Medellín, Colombia. Nearby, Lleras Park is just a short 2-minute public transport ride away, covering a distance of 0.1 km. If you're heading to Plaza Botero in La Candelaria, it takes about 28 minutes by public transport, covering 6.2 km. The Museum of Antioquia, also in La Candelaria, is similarly 28 minutes away by public transport, at a distance of 6.1 km.

From Plaza Botero, you can reach The Charlee Hotel in about 33 minutes by public transport. Lleras Park is 32 minutes away from Plaza Botero, while the Museum of Antioquia is just a quick 1-minute walk, only 2 meters away.

Traveling from Lleras Park to The Charlee Hotel takes about 3 minutes. If you're going to Plaza Botero or the Museum of Antioquia from Lleras Park, both are approximately 27 minutes away by public transport, each covering 6.1 km.

Finally, from the Museum of Antioquia, it takes about 33 minutes to reach The Charlee Hotel and 32 minutes to get to Lleras Park by public transport.
